name: Spike Hike!
description:
A little platformer made in 3 hours! For a challenge with a couple friends

CONTROLS 
WASD/Arrow keys to move
W/Up arrow/Space to jump

Get to the goal and avoid the spikes, climb up ladders to reach new heights!

SOCIALS

Youtube: (1) Spacespy - YouTube 

Twitter: (3) spacespyTV (@spacespy_tv) / Twitter
